title: mikroc 8.2.0.0
description:
Optional: Download mikroC 8.2.0.0 from http://www.mikroe.com/en/compilers/mikroc/pic/download.htm

If you suspect that the file on the server has been altered, use the installer
from the torrent, that version works.

1. Install mikroC by executing mikroC_8_2_0_0.exe
2. make a backup of the microC.exe in the program path
3. copy the microC.exe from the crack directory to the program path and replace
   the original file
4. You can now compile programs larger than 2kB (limit of the demo).
   Try to compile the project found under ExamplesEasyPic5extra_examplesSerial GLCDp18
   It should create a 14.8 kB hexfile in the same directory.
   
If you like you can patch your own original executable, the patcher is included.
I found it on r********.com, thanks to the unknown uploader.
